entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
